Header.title: Be in control
Header.paragraph: This is a truly private chat app. Here, you control the encryption. And you can also set a self-destruct on each message.

About.paragraph: In the background, we will encrypt the message directly on your phone or computer, and our servers will only store the encrypted message. We also do not store the room private password. All this is transparent and can be inspected in the browsers console. This way, you are in control of your privacy.

Features.title: Truly private chat
Features.text: Guarantee end-to-end encryption by selecting your own secret password. This password has to be shared with friends so that they can decrypt the messages. We, the chat service provider, only store encrypted messages.

Features.title: Self destruct
Features.text: Users have an option to destroy messages after a specified amount of time. The data will also be destroyed from the server, and can never be recovered.
